Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.Utilities

  • public final class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A static class housing common methods, constants, and utility functions.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

      Internally used event listener class.

      • getProtocolUtilityInstance

        public static ProtocolUtilities getProtocolUtilityInstance()
        This method should not be called in standard programming. It is only visible for internal use.
        Returns:
        The protocol operation utility instance, or null if it does not exist.

      • clamp

        public static float clamp(float value,
          float minimum,
          float maximum)
        Assure that a value is between two other values.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to clamp.
        minimum - The minimum return value.
        maximum - The maximum return value.
        Returns:
        value if it is between minimum and maximum, minimum if value < minimum, or maximum of value > maximum.
